LMS.D_NAVIGATE_TO_SERVER: Click the button to open the Logitech Media Server web page.
LMS.DESC_REMOVE_TOOLS: Remove tools files from your system
LMS.DESC_INSTALL_TOOLS: Install tools to help measurements. PLEASE WAIT UNTIL UI IS REFRESHED
LMS.TOOLS_INSTALL_WAIT: Your are going to download about 5Mo. Please WAIT until a message of completion appear then press ESC (about 40 sec).
LMS.DOC_TOOLS_FILE_TO_PLAY: Choose a file to play. Must be located in /INTERNAL/FusionDsp/tools/
